snippet: The Obama administration controversies of recent days have reinforced fears of an overreaching government and called into question Mr. Obama’s ability to master his own presidency.
abstract: Obama administration controversies of recent days reinforce fears of overreaching government and call into question Pres Obama's ability to control his own presidency; hope that departure of IRS leader and forceful response to crisis will help bring things back in focus so other agendas can move forward.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration controversies of recent days have reinforced fears of an overreaching government and called into question Mr. Obama’s ability to master his own presidency.

headline.seo: Onset of Woes Casts Pall Over Obama’s Policy Aspirations
headline.main: Onset of Woes Casts Pall Over Obama’s Policy Aspirations
headline.print_headline: An Onset of Woes Raises Questions on Obama Vision
